Title: El Mundo Gira
Plot: A strange yellow rain kills a migrant girl, and her family believes that a mythical creature was the cause and has manifested itself inside the brother of her fiancé, who has since disappeared.
GuestStars: Pamela Diaz, Susan Bain, Robert Thurston, Michael Kopsa, Markus Hondro, Janeth Munoz, Fabricio Santin, Jose Vargus, Tony Dean Smith, Rubén Blades, Raymond Cruz, Jose Yenque, Simi, Lillian Hurst
